work-request
************


Description
===========

This is an asynchronous work request. Work requests help you monitor
long-running operations. When you start a long-running operation, the
service creates a work request. A work request is an activity log that
lets you track each step in the operationâ€™s progress. Each work
request has an OCID that lets you interact with it programmatically
and use it for automation.


Available Commands
==================

* cancel

* get

* list
